page.title: 13Grimsargh Field Day
page.content:
Grimsargh Field Day is an annual event Saturday 29th June was Grimsargh Field day. I was going to take part in the fancy dress with some other friends.We were going to go as the Grimsargh Gruesomes but we changed it to Frankinsteins wedding. We all felt silly walking around in the funny costumes.The judges took a long look at us .
Then we joined the procession and walked around the village. When we reached the park the rose queen was crowned.Then the winners of the fancy dress was announced. First they announced the singles and then the group. The judge said that Frankensteins wedding had won. We all gave a big cheer.
